title: Pickpocket Twitch Skin
body:
Twitch{{champion:29}}  has a gun for his pickpocket skin but it shoots arrows like the original skin. It needs to shoot bullets like Vandle twitch{{champion:29}} . I don't know if gangster twitch is like this too.

Riot please fix this

replies.body:
Hey there! 

This is actually intentional, since it's a 750 RP skin.
And Riot, made a free game. And then centered this free game around money.

This game couldn't be any less centered around money. Everything that you NEED to be able to play, and succeed in this game is free. If you WANT a skin, or WANT to buy a champion that you don't have enough ip for, that is when the money comes in. Skins aren't needed, and Riot is not forcing you to buy them. So yea, this game is the furthest thing from being centered around money.
Just curious, but if this was intentional, why not design the "gun" to be a gun shaped cross bow type of thing. Like making it look like a cool gun crossbow hybrid type of thing?

> [{quoted}](name=Thryale,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=rYYIH31s,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-14T01:26:48.575+0000)
>
> Just curious, but if this was intentional, why not design the "gun" to be a gun shaped cross bow type of thing. Like making it look like a cool gun crossbow hybrid type of thing?

We felt that that would too similar to the base, and wouldn't be cool, since it's already only a 750 skin, and wouldn't be receiving new particles.

Ah, interesting.

I was thinking of something sleeker more gunlike with crossbow artifacts, but eh, I suppose it's not terribly important.

Should be 1350 for the particle effects but it isn't like its a mega inconvenience to have it shoot bullets. If anything it'll just boost sales of the skin. His taunt doesn't make sense either with the skin but it doesn't matter a whole lot.
